files.patch:
@@ -67,1 +67,0 @@ -import static java.time.temporal.ChronoField.MINUTE_OF_DAY; @@ -1466,1 +1465,1 @@ - * locale in the formatter. "midnight" type designates "00:00". + * locale in the formatter. @@ -1483,0 +1482,3 @@ + *

+ * "midnight" type allows both "00:00" as the start-of-day and "24:00" as the + * end-of-day, as long as they are valid with the resolved hour field. @@ -5061,1 +5063,1 @@ - Long value = (hod * 60 + (moh != null ? moh : 0)) % 1_440; + long value = (hod * 60 + (moh != null ? moh : 0)) % 1_440; @@ -5109,2 +5111,2 @@ - * @param locale - * @return + * @param locale locale to be examined + * @return locale store for the locale
